simple.escp.fill.function

Class UnderlineFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.fill.function.Function
      • simple.escp.fill.function.UnderlineFunction

  • public class UnderlineFunction
extends Function
    A built-in function that will generate ESC/P to toggle underline. If the current status of underline printing is off, %{UNDERLINE} will generate ESC/P to switch on underline printing. If underline is already turned on as a result of previous invocation), %{UNDERLINE} will turn off underline printing.
